document.full_text: horseplayers and horse lovers can take heart that the camps of shackleford and animal kingdom have indicated they would like a rubber match at the 143rd running of the belmont stakes.
document.title: on horse racing: with triple crown hopes dashed, enthusiasm grows for a belmont rivalry
lines_and_colors: horseplayers and horse lovers can take heart that the camps of shackleford and animal kingdom have indicated they would like a rubber match at the 143rd running of the belmont stakes.
